And{G1161} he beheld{G1689}{(G5660)} them{G846}, and said{G2036}{(G5627)}, What{G5101} is{G2076}{(G5748)} this{G5124} then{G3767} that is written{G1125}{(G5772)}, The stone{G3037} which{G3739} the builders{G3618}{(G5723)} rejected{G593}{(G5656)}, the same{G3778} is become{G1096}{(G5675)} the head{G2776} of{G1519} the corner{G1137}?

Is it lawful{G1832}{(G5748)} for us{G2254} to give{G1325}{(G5629)} tribute{G5411} unto Caesar{G2541}, or{G2228} no{G3756}?
But{G1161} he perceived{G2657}{(G5660)} their{G846} craftiness{G3834}, and said{G2036}{(G5627)} unto{G4314} them{G846}, Why{G5101} tempt ye{G3985}{(G5719)} me{G3165}?

And{G1161} he said{G2036}{(G5627)} unto them{G846}, Render{G591}{(G5628)} therefore{G5106} unto Caesar{G2541} the things which be{G3588} Caesar's{G2541}, and{G2532} unto God{G2316} the things which be{G3588} God's{G2316}.

Then{G1161} came{G4334}{(G5631)} to him certain{G5100} of the Sadducees{G4523}, which{G3588} deny{G483}{(G5723)} that there is{G1511}{(G5750)} any{G3361} resurrection{G386}; and they asked{G1905}{(G5656)} him{G846},

And{G2532} the second{G1208} took{G2983}{(G5627)} her to wife{G1135}, and{G2532} he{G3778} died{G599}{(G5627)} childless{G815}.

{G1161} Last{G5305} of all{G3956} the woman{G1135} died{G599}{(G5627)} also{G2532}.
